Package com.lohika.alp.log4j

Interface Summary
CloneableLayout Workaround for Cloneable interface that doesn't define clone.
LogNameStrategy Declares interface of an algorithm to give unique name prefixes for test method logs.
TestAppenderBuilder Defines interface to create appenders of the same type for given test methods.
 

Class Summary
Appenders A container to keep all Appender instances of a test method, where each appender belongs to its own TestAppenderDispatcher
AppendersCloser A helper class to close all Appender instances that are attached to ITestResult.
LogFileAttachment  
LogNameStrategyLookup  
TestAppenderDispatcher The TestAppenderDispatcher class forwards given LoggingEvent, which is issued by currently running test method, to related Appender instance.
TestFileAppender TestFileAppender appends log events of test methods into separate files.
 

Exception Summary
AppendersClosedException Represents a condition when operations are performed on already closed Appenders
